snippet: The story of how the deal came together started long before that — in December 2009, with the failure of the last such summit meeting in Copenhagen.
abstract: Landmark climate accord reached by leaders of 195 countries in Paris was result of effort started in December 2009 with failure of last global climate talk in Copenhagen; contributing to success of most recent effort was shift toward viewing global warming as immediate threat and French diplomacy leading up to event that made all participants feel as if their voices were being heard.
lead_paragraph: The story of how the deal came together started long before that — in December 2009, with the failure of the last such summit meeting in Copenhagen.

headline.main: A Climate Deal, 6 Fateful Years in the Making
headline.print_headline: A Climate Deal, 6 Fateful Years in the Making

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
